DataElement.preferredName: Derived Flag Amyloidosis Best Hematologic Response Assessment Outcome of Therapy Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The day, month and year of the amyloidosis best hematologic response to therapy assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Derived Flag Amyloidosis Best Hematologic Response Assessment Outcome of Therapy Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indication that a data element has been derived from one or more data elements._A disorder characterized by the localized or diffuse accumulation of amyloid protein in various anatomic sites. It may be primary, due to clonal plasma cell proliferations; secondary, due to long standing infections, chronic inflammatory disorders, or malignancies; or familial. It may affect the nerves, skin, tongue, joints, heart, liver, spleen, kidneys and adrenal glands._Having the most positive qualities._An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients._Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a data element has been derived from one or more data elements.

A disorder characterized by the localized or diffuse accumulation of amyloid protein in various anatomic sites. It may be primary, due to clonal plasma cell proliferations; secondary, due to long standing infections, chronic inflammatory disorders, or malignancies; or familial. It may affect the nerves, skin, tongue, joints, heart, liver, spleen, kidneys and adrenal glands.
An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
